Articles.Content:
Hi, i lost my reentry effects. I can see the reentry effects before, but until a time i just see the ship is glowing during reentry, but no reentry effects, can anyone help me?

Edited February 8, 2016 by hanhan658
Letter fault

Have you recently turned down your graphics settings? If yes, try reversing what you did.

If no, try deleting physics.cfg in the KSP root directory. The game should automatically recreate it with default values the next time you start it up.

This post covers many different causes and solutions. 

goodluck!

Also i noticed the tantares Return parachute for Vostok didnt brake when deployed, so i smashed the whole capsule into the ground in 197m/s. Are the reason realchute (maybe tantares chutes are 100% not compatipable With realchute) or something wrong With Physics.cfg.

Edited February 8, 2016 by hanhan658
